action.text: SA 4987 fell when SA 4986 (the instructions of the motion to refer) was withdrawn.
Amendment SA 4987 proposed by Senator Schumer to Amendment SA 4986 (the instructions of the motion to refer). (consideration: CR S1089; text: CR S1089) To modify the effective date.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4987 proposed by Senator Schumer to Amendment SA 4986 (the instructions of the motion to refer).
